description:
The Skyline captures the rhythm of the city. The placket’s hidden snap front highlights its clean lines, and the melange gives it depth and forward style. Light and breathable, quick drying and cool, the Diem™ polyester fabric is made from 100% recycled content. Stretch and articulation form the fit and give you freedom to move, and a zippered chest pocket secures smartphone or passport.

Updated with a more sustainable 100% recycled polyester.
name: Arcteryx Skyline LS Shirt - Melange - Mens
